      Methods in net.cloud.gfx.elements.modal with parameters of type TextField 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void InputDialog.textFieldAction(TextField field, java.lang.String text)
      When the text field is acted on (has its text entered) it'll relay that action to this method, which will in turn relay it to whoever is listening for confirmation on this dialog.
